content.raw:
I think this broke the homebrew build:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_rendering-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=75)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/75/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/75/

~~~
ogre/src/OgreScene.cc:376:34: error: no viable conversion from
 'shared_ptr<ignition::rendering::v1::OgreDepthCamera>' to
 'shared_ptr<ignition::rendering::v1::OgreObject>'
  bool result = this->InitObject(camera, _id, _name);
                                 ^~~~~~
~~~

content.raw: Thanks! I am making the changes.

you can make use of the `IGN_RENDREING_RESOURCE_PATH`. Add the definition in [CMakeLists.txt](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/a346e7d9dbdfa29872e1edbbe32c21000b28686f/ogre/src/CMakeLists.txt#lines-17), and look for the ogre media folder like in [this function](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/a346e7d9dbdfa29872e1edbbe32c21000b28686f/ogre/src/OgreRTShaderSystem.cc#lines-396)
content.html: you can make use of the IGN_RENDREING_RESOURCE_PATH. Add the definition in CMakeLists.txt, and look for the ogre media folder like in this function
